texts: You are the royal protector of the Empress of the Isles. She sent you on a mission to the other islands to request their aid for the plague, currently ravaging the capital city.
Unfortunately, they left the capital to rot, waiting to see what will come of it. You came to tell the Empress the bad news.
start.prompt: Suddenly, seemingly out of nowhere, a team of mercenaries appear with swords drawn. What do you do?

success.text: You manage to gun some of them down.
You manage to slash some of them down.

fail.text: Your arm is quickly slashed with a sword and you drop your pistol
